description: The accuracy of a geometry. This has its own tag because it doesn't fit cleanly into any other accuracy definition.
name: hgis:accuracy

description: If/how the geometry was validated against imagery.
name: hgis:imagery_confirmed

description: The point is on a building, but you can't verify its type (e.g. hair salon).
name: hgis:imagery_confirmed=assessed

description: You can look at the point and tell what it is (e.g. mosque or airport)
name: hgis:imagery_confirmed=confirmed

description: Imagery is pixelated or cloudy -- can not be assessed.
name: hgis:imagery_confirmed=reported
